privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy applies to the Memory Dash mobile application (the "Application"), developed by Teal Ducks (the "Service Provider"). By using the Application, you agree to the collection and use of information as described in this policy.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.intro: The Application does not create or manage its own user accounts. Users authenticate through Google Play Games Services. We collect and store the following data:

subsection1.title: 1.1 Google Play Games Information
subsection1.intro: When you sign in using Google Play Games Services, we may access:
subsection1.item2: Display name associated with your Google Play Games profile
subsection1.purpose: This information is required to enable leaderboard functionality and to maintain game progress related to Play Games features.

subsection2.title: 1.2 Leaderboard Data (via PlayFab)
subsection2.intro: To store leaderboard scores, the Application uses PlayFab, a third-party backend service.
subsection2.noPersonalData: No personal information such as email, device ID, or IP address is stored by the Service Provider.

subsection3.title: 1.3 Advertising Data (AdMob)
subsection3.intro: The Application displays ads via Google AdMob.
subsection3.processed: This data is processed according to Google's advertising policies.
subsection3.policy: AdMob Privacy Policy can be found under Google Play Services.

section2.title: 2. Third-Party Services
section2.intro: The Application uses the following third-party SDKs and services:

service1.name: Google Play Games Services
service1.description: Used for authentication and gaming features.

section3.title: 3. Account & Data Deletion
section3.intro: The Application does not create an internal user account system.
section3.requestInfo: However, users may request deletion of data stored by the Service Provider (leaderboard entries stored in PlayFab). You may request data deletion by contacting:
section3.whenRequested: When a deletion request is received:
section3.deletion1: All leaderboard entries linked to your Google Play Games Player ID will be permanently removed from PlayFab
section3.deletion2: No additional or hidden user data is stored by the Application
section3.deletion3: Google Play Games account data cannot be deleted by the Service Provider (This is controlled by Google and can only be managed by the user)

section4.title: 4. Children's Privacy
section4.notIntended: The Application is not intended for children under the age of 13.
section4.noKnowingly: We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If such data is discovered, it will be deleted immediately.

section5.title: 5. Security
section5.description: The Service Provider takes reasonable measures to protect user information stored in PlayFab from unauthorized access or disclosure.

section6.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
section6.description: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. You are encouraged to review this page occasionally for changes.

section7.title: 7. Contact Us
section7.description: For privacy-related questions or data deletion requests, you may contact:

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion Request
dataDeletion.intro: This page explains how users can request the deletion of their data for the Memory Dash app, provided by Teal Ducks.
dataDeletion.noUserAccounts: Memory Dash does not create its own user accounts.
dataDeletion.authMethod: Authentication is handled through Google Play Games Services.
dataDeletion.appStores: The app only stores the following data:

canDelete.title: Data That Can Be Deleted
canDelete.item1: All leaderboard scores stored in PlayFab
canDelete.googleNote: Your Google Play Games account cannot be deleted by the developer.
canDelete.googleManaged: It is managed solely by Google and can only be controlled by the user.

howToRequest.title: How to Request Deletion
howToRequest.description: To request data deletion, please contact us at:
howToRequest.subjectLine: Include the subject line: "Memory Dash Data Deletion Request".

timeline.title: Deletion Timeline
timeline.description: Your data will be permanently deleted within 72 hours after receiving the request.
